disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Hemorrhage.

blurb.value: Darius aims his attacks strategically, causing his target to bleed. This effect stacks up to five times. Enemies that reach max Hemorrhage cause Darius to gain Noxian Might, greatly increasing his damage.

description.value: Innate: Damaging basic attacks on-attack and abilities cause the target to bleed every 1.25 seconds for 5 seconds, dealing 13 − 30 (based on level) (+ 30% bonus AD) physical damage over the duration. This can stack up to 5 times for a maximum of 65 − 150 (based on level) (+ 150% bonus AD) physical damage over the duration. The total damage is increased by 75% against monsters.

description2.value: Upon applying full Hemorrhage stacks to an enemy champion or killing one with Noxian Guillotine, Darius gains Noxian Might for 5 seconds.

description3.value: Noxian Might: Darius gains 30 − 230 (based on level)  bonus attack damage and instantly applies full Hemorrhage stacks through his usual means.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: * Hemorrhage will grant vision of champions it is going to kill. Hemorrhage does not apply to structures nor wards. Darius' attacks and abilities have to deal damage to apply Hemorrhage. Hemorrhage cannot be applied to/refreshed against invulnerable targets. Hemorrhage can be applied to and refreshed against shielded targets. Spell shield prevents Hemorrhage's application from abilities only.
notes.description: Displays additional information with effect table to the right.

disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Decimate.

effect radius.value: 240 / 460

blurb.value: Darius winds up and swings his axe in a wide circle. Enemies struck by the blade take more damage than those struck by the handle. Darius heals based on enemy champions hit by the blade.

description.value: Active: Darius hefts his axe for 0.75 seconds, and then swings it around himself, dealing physical damage to nearby enemies, reduced to 35% against enemies hit by the handle.

description2.value: Against champions and large monsters, Darius heals for  15% − 45% (based on enemies hit by the blade) of his missing health. The handle of Darius' axe will not apply Hemorrhage nor heal him.

description3.value: Darius is unable to declare basic attacks or cast Apprehend or Noxian Guillotine during Decimate.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.description: Displays additional information with effect table to the right.

disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Crippling Strike.

blurb.value: Darius's next attack strikes an enemy's crucial artery. As they bleed out, their Movement Speed is slowed.

description.value: Active: Darius' next basic attack within 4 seconds becomes unstoppable, gains  25 bonus range, deals bonus physical damage and slows the target by 90% for 1 second.

description2.value: If Crippling Strike kills the target, it refunds its  mana cost and half of its  cooldown.

description3.value: Crippling Strike resets Darius' basic attack timer, and is affected by critical strike modifiers.

description4.value: The attack's animation can be cancelled by casting Decimate, but the attack will still land.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: * Spell shield will not block the damage. Crippling Strike will trigger Manaflow Band. Despite its name, Crippling Strike does not cripple anymore.
notes.description: Displays additional information with effect table to the right.

disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Apprehend.

effect radius.value: 535

angle.value: 50°

blurb.value: Darius hones his axe, passively causing his physical damage to ignore a percentage of his target's Armor. When activated, Darius sweeps up his enemies with his axe's hook and pulls them to him.

description.value: Passive: Darius gains  armor penetration.

description2.value: Active: Darius pulls in all enemies in front of him in the target direction, slowing them by 40% for 1 second, and briefly gaining sight of the area around the pull.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: * Enemies hit by Apprehend will rebound a short distance away from Darius' location after being pulled into close proximity, during which they are still considered airborne. After the pull, Darius will attempt to basic attack the closest pulled target. The armor penetration stacks multiplicatively with other forms of percentage armor penetration.
notes.description: Displays additional information with effect table to the right.

disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Noxian Guillotine.

target range.value: 475

blurb.value: Darius leaps to an enemy champion and strikes a lethal blow, dealing true damage. This damage is increased for each stack of Hemorrhage on the target. If Noxian Guillotine is a killing blow, its cooldown is refreshed for a brief duration.

description.value: Active: Darius attempts to execute the target enemy champion, leaping towards them to deal  true damage, increased by 0% − 100% (based on Hemorrhage stacks).

leveling.value: True Damage:»100 / 200 / 300 (+ 75% bonus AD)«Bonus Damage Per Stack:»20 / 40 / 60 (+ 15% bonus AD)«Maximum True Damage:200 / 400 / 600 (+ 150% bonus AD)

description2.value: If the target dies within 0.15 seconds after being hit by Noxian Guillotine, Darius causes all nearby minions and monsters to flee for 3 seconds during which they are rapidly slowed by up to 99% over the duration, and is able to recast the ability within 20 seconds at no cost, which refreshes on further executions.

description3.value: At rank 3, Noxian Guillotine has no  mana cost and instead completely resets its  cooldown if it kills its target.

description4.value: Darius is unable to cast Decimate and Apprehend for 0.25 seconds after Noxian Guillotine's cast time.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: * The ability does not go on  cooldown nor consume mana if it's interrupted during the cast. This may only happen if: Darius or his target dies during the leap. Darius loses sight of his target. The target becomes untargetable. Noxian Guillotine's cooldown after the recast or recast window is calculated by taking the values at the end, and using this formula: (Noxian Guillotine's Cooldown - time since first cast) × (1 -  cdr). Noxian Guillotine applies Hemorrhage after the damage. Darius will only leap towards the target if it is at range, or leap backwards if it is very close. This leap can pass very thin terrain and will otherwise not be able to. In any case, Darius will still hit the target. The ability is disabled while grounded or rooted even if Darius is in the range in which he does not leap. Noxian Guillotine will not reset nor trigger Noxian Might if used to kill a clone or a target protected by resurrection. Noxian Guillotine will reset but not trigger Noxian Might if it finishes off a target that is in a zombie state.
notes.description: Displays additional information with effect table to the right.
